title: Bug 49536: No content returned when accessing URL with no webapps deployed
OB: When a Tomcat 7 instance is started with no webapps deployed and a URL is accessed, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
EB: When there are no webapps deployed, accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance should result in the server returning an HTTP error 404 instead of an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
SR:
1. Download Tomcat 7 from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL
4. Observe that the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
